title: GH#2065: Normalize text to NFD consistently
description: Normalize all text to NFD throughout the system for consistent Unicode handling. GitHub issue #2065

title: GH#2092: Linq2Db timezone bug
description: Linq2Db not handling timezones correctly. GitHub issue #2092

title: GH#2002: Advanced filters - add fields to FW Lite
description: Add advanced filter capability to FW Lite. GitHub issue #2002

title: GH#2057: Sync appears successful but S/R failed
description: Sync shows success but SendReceive actually failed. Misleading UX. GitHub issue #2057

title: GH#2108: CanSyncRandomEntries failure - Affixes field
description: Fieldname 'Affixes' does not exist when testing FwData API. Related to MorphTypes. GitHub issue #2108

title: GH#2062: Partial syncs cause duplicate changes in history
description: Partial syncs write duplicate changes to history because pending changes dont clear properly. GitHub issue #2062

title: GH#2082: UI to check for updates in FW Lite
description: Add UI to check for software updates in FW Lite. GitHub issue #2082

title: GH#2052: S/R failed, rolled back but lost CRDT changes
description: Sync failed and rolled back, but user lost CRDT changes. Data loss scenario. GitHub issue #2052
